title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
synopsis: Ryousuke Hazuki is a young man whose heart has been stolen away, stopping by the local floral shop daily in order to catch a glimpse of the beautiful Rokka Shimao, the shop's owner. In hopes of getting close to her, he decides to get a part-time job at the shop, but before he is able to make his move, he runs into a major roadblock: in her apartment dwells a ghost who claims to be Rokka's deceased husband.
voices: ['Nakamura, Yuuichi', 'Ohara, Sayaka', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Nakamura, Chie', 'Miyake, Marie']
staff: [['Matsuo, Kou', ['Director']], ['ryo-timo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Jinbo, Masato', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Shibata, Shirou', ['Episode Director']]]
